B. The area near the tower crane at the construction site ahead is currently in the center of my field of view.  
C. The area near the tower crane at the construction site ahead is not within my field of view.  
D. The tower crane at the construction site ahead is currently in the upper right corner of my field of view.  
E. The tower crane at the construction site ahead is currently on the right side of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer:
Option: B; Reason: The tower crane at the construction site is clearly visible and positioned in the center of the field of view. This aligns with the description in option B, which states that the area near the tower crane is in the center of the field of view. 

Thus, the correct answer is **B. The area near the tower crane at the construction site ahead is currently in the center of my field of view.**
